AboutMe.Intro: Passionate about frontend development. I love creating websites and enhancing user experiences with performance and accessibility in mind. Beyond coding, I enjoy music, movies, gaming and hanging out with friends to recharge. Proud tech nerd staying updated on the evolving tech landscape.

Accenture.Text: I developed a mobile app using React Native and worked on the backend using NestJS. I also teamed up on a project in the banking sector, focusing on AngularJS, where I played a key role in building the frontend. Additionally, I collaborated on training an AI with regex to enhance its ability to detect and respond to unsafe messages.

DGESTE2.Text: I designed and developed a dynamic web application for a school information management system.

DGESTE1.Text: I designed and developed an internal messaging application for team collaboration. Additionally, I played a key role in configuring and installing Office 365, offering crucial helpdesk support for troubleshooting and resolving issues. I also managed the installation and configuration of Windows machines for team members.

Designer.Label: Designer
Designer.Text: I value clear content organization, minimalist design, and purposeful user interactions.

Developer.Label: Developer
Developer.Text: I love coding from scratch and turning ideas into reality on the web.

Tools.Label: Tools
Tools.Text: Basically, the tools I use mirror my coding philosophy.

PageNotFound.Title: Lost in the code forest
PageNotFound.Text: Looks like we took a wrong turn in the code. Let's find our way back to the homepage together.
